Package fr.umlv.escapeirandroid.entity

Interface Summary
Displayable The Interface Displayable defines the behavior of something drawable, it means it has to implements the following methods
Fireable The Interface Fireable defines the behavior of something that can be fired.
Launchable The Interface Launchable defines the comportement of something launchable.
 

Class Summary
AbstractShip The Class AbstractShip defines methods and fields common to any Ship
AbstractWeapon The Class AbstractWeapon defines methods and fields common to any Weapon
BodyDescription The Class BodyDescription provides a way to store information needed to create an ennemy body;
Bonus The Class Bonus describes the specification of a bonus object
EnemyShip The Class EnemyShip defines methods and fields in common with any enemy ship
EnemyType The Class EnemyType describe an enemy ship, name, health point etc..
Entity The Class Entity defines the specification of any object in the physic world that need anykind of treatment
FactoryEnemy The Class FactoryEnemy provides a way to instantiate EnemyShip objects providing a BodyDescription object
FactoryWeapon The Class FactoryWeapon provides a way to instantiate AbstractWeapon providing the name of the weapon.
Fireball The Class Fireball defines the comportment of a shiboleet weapon, providing a method to launch the weapon and to display it
HeroShip The Class HeroShip defines the specifications of the ship used by the player
Missile The Class Missile defines the behavior of a shiboleet weapon, providing a method to launch the weapon and to display it
Shiboleet The Class Shiboleet defines the behavior of a shiboleet weapon, providing a method to launch the weapon and to display it
SpriteAnimator The Class SpriteAnimator animates a image containing an array of sprite
Triforce The Class Triforce defines the behavior of a triforce weapon, providing a method to launch the weapon and to display it
 

Enum Summary
Entity.entityCategory The Enum entityCategory describing mask between Jbox2d bodies.
Entity.EntityState
